title: Study Group Match Web Application
description: Designed and developed a full-stack web application that allows university students to create and join study sessions based on their classes and school, following Agile development practices.
Implemented user authentication, profile management, and session management features using React for the frontend and Node.js/Express for the backend, employing RESTful API design principles.
Utilized MySQL for data storage, optimizing database queries for efficient session retrieval and management.

title: Weather App
description: Built a weather-check app using ReactJS and Firebase.
Allows users to track weather in favorite locations globally.
Integrates with weather API for real-time updates.

title: Sport App
description: A mobile app to find nearby soccer games.
Uses Google Maps API for real-time location tracking.
